segments.text: Oh , and there's one more thing you have to do every hour on the hour , sweets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you do that when your nose needs blowing . I was talking about a way to make your throat heal faster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , please , Mom ! Don't make me gargle with saltwater !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It works better than any medicine , Lily . I'll make you a glass right now , and you'll finish it !
segments.speaker: S2
